title: Back Run - Low Grade w Clean Backs
author: thehoodedcoder

posts.post_title: Back Run - Low Grade w Clean Backs
posts.post_content:
Looking for low grade cards in each of the following backs for a back run.

Not looking to pay ridiculous prices as they are just for a back run. The cheaper the better.

Uzit
Piedmont 460 factory 42
Lennox(Brown)
Hindu(Red)
Drum 350
Carolina Brights
Broadleaf 460


Kevin

Kevin,

You had PM'd me asking for scans and prices.  I sent several over but no response.  Not sure if that's because you didn't like what you saw or because you didn't receive anything at all.....

Either way feel free to email me directly at [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url] if you'd like to talk further.

Best,
Scott

sorry. i did get them. i think they were just overpriced. i will look again. i should still have them.

kevin
"just" for a back run...that's kinda funny!
